descriptionHTML:
Widgets:
★ Сountdown to Christmas or New Year; (You can setup one of several dates: Christmas, New Year or set yours date for countdown.);
★ Christmas tree widget (Simple static Christmas tree from Plasticine Square Live Wallpaper);
★ Snowman widget (Simple static snowman from Plasticine Square Live Wallpaper);

Android Wear App:
★ Сountdown to Christmas

Android Wear Watch face:
★ Сountdown to Christmas

Enjoy this gifts, Merry Christmas and Happy New Year !!!!

For Android 4.X or better.

comments: Okay so a lot of people don't understand how this is used but once you've downloaded the app what you do is not in the app it's on the home screen, hold down on your home screen, three options should appear on the bottom, click widgets, then look through the widget options and look for this apps name, then you'll have three different style options, hold on the one you want and you can drag it to the slide you want
IT DOES NOT WORK ... I guess unless you own a Nexus or Google phone, but not sure neither
What day does the app reset itself? Its Dec 26th and the small Widget says 365.
It adds to your home screen if you hold down and gives you what you want for the countdown of christmasüéÑüéÅüëåüëç
Hate it did not work at all
Quick. Easy. Perfect for my Christmas countdown needs.
